H0.text: In terms of tonnage of cargo handled, which is the world's largest port. Shanghai

H1.text: In terms of tonnage of cargo handled, which is the world's largest port. Singapore

H2.text: In terms of tonnage of cargo handled, which is the world's largest port. Hong Kong

H3.text: In terms of tonnage of cargo handled, which is the world's largest port. R'dam

A4.text: In terms of cargo tonnage, Singapore is behind Shanghai with 423 million freight tons handled.

A5.text: The port is the world's busiest port in terms of shipping tonnage handled, with 1.15 billion gross tons (GT) handled in 2005.

A6.text: the port is one of the busiest ports in the world, in the three categories of shipping movements, cargo handled and passengers carried
